com.appetizeapp.android.wheel.adapter

Interface WheelViewAdapter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractWheelAdapter, AbstractWheelTextAdapter, AdapterWheel, ArrayWheelAdapter, CounterWheelAdapter, LevelWheelAdapter, NumericWheelAdapter, RowWheelAdapter, SeatWheelAdapter, SectionWheelAdapter

    public interface WheelViewAdapter
    Wheel items adapter interface

                          android.view.View convertView,
                          android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Get a View that displays the data at the specified position in the data set
        Parameters:
        index - the item index
        convertView - the old view to reuse if possible
        parent - the parent that this view will eventually be attached to

        the wheel item View
